title: Highest Regulatory Quality
description: In 2023, Australia achieved a perfect score of 100 in the Regulatory Quality Percentile Rank, indicating exceptional governance and regulatory standards.

title: High Income Tax Revenue
description: In 2022, taxes on income, profits, and capital gains constituted 67.86% of Australia's revenue, highlighting a significant reliance on these sources for government funding.

title: Significant Mineral Depletion
description: Australia experienced a mineral depletion cost of $68.6 billion in 2021, reflecting the extensive extraction of natural resources.

title: High Preprimary School Enrollment
description: In 2020, Australia's gross enrollment rate in preprimary education was 160.21%, indicating a robust early childhood education system.

title: Gender Parity in Preprimary Education
description: In 2020, both male and female preprimary enrollment rates were high, with males at 163.34% and females at 156.92%, showcasing gender parity in early education.

title: Rising Childhood Overweight Prevalence
description: By 2024, 26.4% of children under 5 in Australia were estimated to be overweight, indicating a growing public health concern.

title: Low Battle-Related Deaths
description: In 2018, Australia reported only one battle-related death, reflecting a peaceful domestic environment.
